about_the_game: For the aspiring karate master, sweep the leg with the Nemesis Pack of Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising. Dominate and stun your opponents in the All Valley Tournament mode with 5 exclusive, playable boss characters, including Terry Silver. Then crank up the bass with a choose-your-own track Jukebox mode. The Nemeses: Go to the mat and unleash the martial art skills of Terry Silver, Hammer, Bo, Gabriel, and Skeleton Lord in the All-Valley Tournament mode Jukebox Mode: Choose your track, rock out and punish your enemies with an all-original new score from the official Cobra Kai composers: Zach Robinson and Leo Birenberg
detailed_description: For the aspiring karate master, sweep the leg with the Nemesis Pack of Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising. Dominate and stun your opponents in the All Valley Tournament mode with 5 exclusive, playable boss characters, including Terry Silver. Then crank up the bass with a choose-your-own track Jukebox mode. The Nemeses: Go to the mat and unleash the martial art skills of Terry Silver, Hammer, Bo, Gabriel, and Skeleton Lord in the All-Valley Tournament mode Jukebox Mode: Choose your track, rock out and punish your enemies with an all-original new score from the official Cobra Kai composers: Zach Robinson and Leo Birenberg

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 BIT only) or above
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 - 3.1GHZ / Intel i5-4460 - 3.2GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 380 - 4GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 - 4GB
  • Storage: 48 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SDD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 BIT only) or above
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 - 3.6GHZ / Intel i5-9400f - 2.9GHZ
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 5500XT - 8GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 - 6GB
  • Storage: 48 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SDD recommended

short_description: Strike first with the Nemesis Pack: The Nemeses: Go to the mat with the martial arts prowess of Terry Silver, Hammer, Bo, Gabriel and Skeleton Lord in All Valley Tournament mode, Jukebox Mode: Choose your track, rock out and punish your enemies with an all-original Cobra Kai score

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch
